mapper.select: SELECT UserInfo.UserID as userFlow, UserInfo.Password as password, CASE when Sex = 0 then '女' when Sex = 1 then '男' END as userSex, TrueName as userName, UserType as userType, roleId as roleFlow, CASE when roleId = 4 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 6 then 'Teacher' when roleId = 14 then 'Header' when roleId = 1 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 2 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 5 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 36 then 'Secretary' when roleId = 10 then 'Tutor' END as roleId, CASE when roleId = 4 then '实习生' when roleId = 6 then '带教老师' when roleId = 14 then '科主任' when roleId = 1 then '研究生' when roleId = 2 then '住院医师' when roleId = 5 then '八年制' when roleId = 36 then '教学秘书' when roleId = 10 then '导师' END as roleName,hosID FROM UserInfo LEFT JOIN UserRole on UserRole.UserID = UserInfo.UserID WHERE UserInfo.UserName = #{userCode} and UserRole.roleId in(4,6,1,14,2,5,36,10) order by UserRole.roleId desc

SELECT top 1 UserInfo.UserID as userFlow, UserInfo.Password as password, UserInfo.userName as userCode, CASE when Sex = 0 then '女' when Sex = 1 then '男' END as userSex, TrueName as userName, UserType as userType, szks as szks , UserInfo.HosID as hosID, HosQC as hosQC , roleId as roleFlow, CASE when roleId = 4 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 6 then 'Teacher' when roleId = 14 then 'Header' when roleId = 1 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 2 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 5 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 36 then 'Secretary' when roleId = 10 then 'Tutor' END as roleId, CASE when roleId = 4 then '实习生' when roleId = 6 then '带教老师' when roleId = 14 then '科主任' when roleId = 1 then '研究生' when roleId = 2 then '住院医师' when roleId = 5 then '八年制' when roleId = 36 then '教学秘书' when roleId = 10 then '导师' END as roleName FROM UserInfo LEFT JOIN UserRole on UserRole.UserID = UserInfo.UserID left join HospitalInfo on HospitalInfo.HosID = UserInfo.HosID WHERE UserInfo.UserID = #{userFlow} and UserRole.roleId in(4,6,1,14,2,5,36,10) order by UserRole.roleId desc

SELECT UserInfo.UserID as userFlow, UserInfo.Password as password, CASE when Sex = 0 then '女' when Sex = 1 then '男' END as userSex, TrueName as userName, UserType as userType, roleId as roleFlow, CASE when roleId = 4 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 6 then 'Teacher' when roleId = 1 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 2 then 'Trainee' when roleId = 5 then 'Trainee' END as roleId, CASE when roleId = 4 then '实习生' when roleId = 6 then '带教老师' when roleId = 1 then '研究生' when roleId = 2 then '住院医师' when roleId = 5 then '八年制' END as roleName FROM UserInfo LEFT JOIN UserRole on UserRole.UserID = UserInfo.UserID LEFT JOIN UserCycleSec on UserCycleSec.UserID = UserInfo.UserID WHERE UCSID = #{doctorFlow} and UserRole.roleId in(4,6,1,2,5)
select DicItem from dbo.Dicitem d join Dictionary a on d.DicID=a.DicID where DicName=#{dicName}

select UserInfo.UserID as userFlow, Role.roleId as roleFlow, CASE when Role.roleId = 4 then 'Trainee' when Role.roleId = 6 then 'Teacher' when Role.roleId = 14 then 'Header' when Role.roleId = 1 then 'Trainee' when Role.roleId = 2 then 'Trainee' when Role.roleId = 5 then 'Trainee' when Role.roleId = 36 then 'Secretary' when Role.roleId = 10 then 'Tutor' END as roleId, CASE when Role.roleId = 4 then '实习生' when Role.roleId = 6 then '带教老师' when Role.roleId = 14 then '科主任' when Role.roleId = 1 then '研究生' when Role.roleId = 2 then '住院医师' when Role.roleId = 5 then '八年制' when Role.roleId = 36 then '教学秘书' when Role.roleId = 10 then '导师' END as roleName from UserInfo left join UserRole on UserRole.UserID = UserInfo.UserID left join Role on Role.RoleID = UserRole.RoleID where UserInfo.UserID = #{userFlow} and Role.roleId in (6,14,36,10)
